entry.title: publication
entry.content:
Publications

Journal & Conference

  1. Y. Tian et al., “Efficient Deep-Learning-Driven Sparse-Target Imaging Method for Array Borehole Radar in Nonuniform Medium,” in IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, vol. 62, pp. 1-14, 2024, Art no. 2000914, doi: 10.1109/TGRS.2023.3346464. (中科院1区Top，IF 8.2)
  2. Y. Tian et al., “Local Manifold Embedding Cross-Domain Subspace Learning for Drift Compensation of Electronic Nose Data,” IEEE Trans. Instrum. Meas., vol. 70, pp. 1–12, 2021, doi: 10.1109/TIM.2021.3108529. （中科院2区Top，IF 5.6）
  3. Y. Tian et al., “Matrix-Pencil-Based Waterflow Velocity Detection Method by 24 GHz Millimetre-Wave Radar”, IEEE Antennas and Wireless Propagation Letters, Accepted, 2024. （中科院2区Top，IF 5.2）
  4. Y. Tian et al., “Adaptive Gradient Projection Correction Method for Resistivity Array Imaging Logging,” IEEE Sensors Journal, Accepted, 2024. （中科院2区Top，IF 4.3）
  5. Y. Tian et al., “A Nonlinear Manifold Embedding Extreme Learning Machine to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Nose,” IEEE Sensors Journal, Accepted, 2024. （中科院2区Top，IF 4.3）
  6. Y. Tian et al., “A Drift-Compensating Novel Deep Belief Classification Network to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Noses,” IEEE Access, vol. 8, pp. 121385–121397, 2020, doi: 10.1109/ACCESS.2020.3006729. （中科院3区，IF 3.9）
  7. Y. Tian et al., “A Deep-Learning-Based Borehole Radar Sparse Target Imaging Method with High Accuracy in Nonuniform Medium,” 2023 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (USNC-URSI), Portland, OR, USA, 2023, pp. 1809-1810, doi: 10.1109/USNC-URSI52151.2023.10238140. （CCF B类会议）
  8. 田雨桐等， “基于自适应梯度投影的阵列成像错位校正方法,” 2023年全国微波毫米波会议 ，2023 ，青岛
  9. 田雨桐等，”基于启发式优化的毫米波雷达水流测速方法”，2023年电路与系统年会，2023，北京
  10. 田雨桐等，“基于集成主副瓣功率比的低副瓣波束成形方法”，2023年全国天线年会，2023，哈尔滨
  11. 田雨桐等，“基于低秩稀疏表示模型的电阻率成像去噪”，2023年全国天线年会，2023，哈尔滨
  12. R. Yi, J. Yan, D. Shi, Y. Tian et al., “Improving the Performance of Drifted/Shifted Electronic Nose Systems by Cross-Domain Transfer using Common Transfer Samples,” Sens. Actuators B Chem., vol. 329, no. 11, p. 129162, 2020. (中科院1区Top，IF 8.4)
  13. Y. Zhang, J. Yan, Z. Wang, Z. Wang, Y. Tian et al., “TDACNN: Target-domain-free domain adaptation convolutional neural network for drift compensation in gas sensors,” Sens. Actuators B Chem, vol. 361, p. 131739, Jun. 2022, doi: 10.1016/j.snb.2022.131739. (中科院1区Top，IF 8.4)

Patent

  1. 闫嘉，田雨桐等，“一种基于流形学习的跨域子空间学习电子鼻漂移补偿方法”，发明专利 CN 202110923440.4，2021年08月12日
  2. 田雨桐等，“回收用油检测装置”，，实用新型专利 CN 201922490640.6，2019年12月31日
  3. 李廷军，田雨桐等，“一种基于自适应梯度投影的电阻率成像错位校正方法”，发明专利 CN 202210464197.9，2022年04月29日
  4. 李廷军，田雨桐等“一种多基站间基于定位信号转发的位置解算方法”，发明专利 CN 202211088929.5，2022年09月07日

entry.title: any title
entry.content:
Education Background

  • University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China
    Doctor degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2023-Now
    Supervisor: Prof. Yong Li

  • University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China
    Master degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2021-2023
    Supervisor: Associate Prof. Tingjun Li

  • Southwest University
    Bychelor of engineering, Electronic information engeering, 2017-2021
    Supervisor: Associate Prof. Jia Yan

Research Interests

  • Wireless radio navigation and radar-related baseband signal processing,
  • Digital Phased Array Signal Processing, Pattern Synthesis, and Waveform Design,
  • High speed Maglev and railway wireless communication,
  • Electronic nose system,
  • Machine learning and Pattern recognization,
  • Optimization theory.

Techniques & Skills

  • MATLAB for Algorithm Simulation, statistic processing.
  • Verilog for FPGA Programming and Implementation in Vivado Platform
  • C/C++ for Microprocessors Development (STM32, ESP32, Arduino, etc.)
  • Python for Machine Learning Models Implementations
  • Altium Designer for Circuit Design in System Level

Contact me

  • E-mail: yttian2021@std.uestc.edu.cn

Last updated on Feb 3, 2024.
